Primary Contact: Monica Chui, Regional Manager; Email: mchui@liver.ca
Service Details: - Promotes liver health, reduces the incidence and impact of all liver diseases, and improves the quality of life of those living with liver disease- 'Living with Liver Disease' program offers patients, family members and friends an opportunity to learn about the disease and how to cope and provides a valuable forum for patients to connect with one another, share their experiences and ask questions about their individual concerns
